alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Emmons; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 10:55PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Kidder, Stutsman, Emmons, Logan, LaMoure, McIntosh, and Dickey counties. * WHEN...Until Noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to blowing snow reducing visibility. A blizzard will continue through Thursday morning, creating dangerous to impossible travel conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel this evening through Thursday morning should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Emmons; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman
